name: Leverage Machine Iso Row
how_to_perform:
1. Sit at the lever machine iso row with your knees securely strapped under the knee pad and your feet flat on the floor.

2. Reach forward and take hold of the bar with both hands, keeping your arms straight.
3. Keeping your torso stationary, pull the bar towards you while drawing your elbows in close to your body.
4. Focus on squeezing your back muscles at the top point of contraction while maintaining control throughout the entire movement.
5. To return to the starting position, release the bar until it is nearly level with your chest. Avoid letting the bar swing or move uncontrollably.
short_summary: The leverage machine iso row is a back exercise used for targeting various muscle groups in the upper and lower back regions.
